text: Andrine Stolsmo Hegerberg (born 6 June 1993) is a Norwegian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Norwegian club SK Brann. ==Career statistics== ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Norway 2012 1 0 2013 1 0 2014 3 0 2015 6 0 2016 6 1 2017 8 0 Total 25 1 :Scores and results list Norway's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Hegerberg goal.
